Posts.Content: I had almost the same thing done to me, except I had a great doctor and he sent me to a breast surgeon and wanted a biopsy done. It turned out to be nothing........but we removed it and now I don't have to even worry about it!!!! Good doctors take care of their patients..........
Posts.Title: Ambiguous Mammogram Results 1 2

Posts.Content: you make sure they do both breasts!! you're not too young for mammogram if you're having pain!!!! You may need to change docs......it doesn't sound good. Get a mammogram and ultrasound!!!!! Don't take no for an answer!!!!
Posts.Title: Breast pain and discharge

Posts.Content: Never ever heard of green coming out of breasts.........you need to get to the mammogram before Feb...............go now!!!!!
Posts.Title: Green discharge

Posts.Content: probably nothing...but get your yearly mammogram....don't put it off....all you ladies!!
Posts.Title: Breast discharge 1 2 3

Posts.Content: Please go for regular yearly mammograms. You said you're 40........you need this eavery year.........then if they do find something........it's early detected and you have a chance to correct it early........breast cancer is soooooo preventable..........
Posts.Title: Found a lump and am scared

Posts.Content: Your friend sounds like she wants attention. Her parents would have to be notified....by law....I don't care what state you live in. I think she should come clean and not wish something so horrible on herself. 15 is not an age for breast cancer...It's almost unheardof..............you need to have a talk with your friend. She needs another kind of help that chemo won't do for her!!
Posts.Title: Something is not right. Please Help.

Posts.Content: You should not be having any pain in your breasts. When was your last mammogram? And how old are you? Is it time for your period? Soreness is normal during that time of month, but you're talking about PAIN. I would go to the doctor and get that checked out immediately.
Posts.Title: Please Help-Severe Breast Pain
